thread.title: Chrissy Teigen Claps Back At Hater On Twitter Over Trump’s Muslim Ban
thread.title_full: Chrissy Teigen Claps Back At Hater On Twitter Over Trump’s Muslim Ban

author: Robert Anthony
title: Chrissy Teigen Claps Back At Hater On Twitter Over Trump’s Muslim Ban

organizations.name: hater on twitter over trump’s muslim ban like us on facebook

text:
Like Us On Facebook 
When Chrissy Teigen claps back, Chrissy Teigen claps back hard. 
Time and time again, we’ve seen plenty of haters flock to the supermodel’s Twitter account in attempts to troll her as if she doesn’t have the best comebacks among celebrities. Giphy 
Furious Trump supporters learned that the hard way after the 31-year-old star took to Twitter to voice her true feelings about President Donald Trump and his recent executive orders to ban the entry of immigrants from seven Muslim-majority countries into the United States. Trump signs executive order on travel ban for seven nations To view this video please enable JavaScript, and considerupgrading to a web browser that supports HTML5 video 
Teigen was short and concise but very clear with her words. As thousands of protesters took to the streets and major airports throughout the country to stand up against the Muslim ban, Teigen tweeted, 
Donald Trump is an unwell, evil human being. To the core. 
As expected, the vile haters flooded in Chrissy’s Twitter mentions like a swarm of cockroaches for simply expressing herself. The tweet racked up over 53,000 retweets and 153,000 likes, what did you expect?! Here’s Chrissy Teigen’s tweet calling out President Trump for his controversial executive orders to ban immigrants from select countries on Saturday. Donald Trump is an unwell, evil human being. To the core. 
— christine teigen (@chrissyteigen) January 28, 2017 When one hater challenged Teigen calling her “just another celebrity that doesn’t live in the real world,” she responded perfectly. @chrissyteigen Just another celebrity that doesn't live in the real World and has no idea what the hell is going on. 
— Chris Sussdorf (@chrissussdorf) January 28, 2017 As always, she had the last word. Sarcasm did the trick. Yeah I am watching from a fucking throne in space. https://t.co/FVUlhHijFf 
— christine teigen (@chrissyteigen) January 28, 2017 Obviously, she received way more hate than that. It began with the generalization of liberals (typical). @chrissyteigen Liberals are hilarious 
— Josh Richardson (@j_c_richa) January 28, 2017 They just don’t see eye-to-eye. @chrissyteigen Horrible thing to say of any Human being, especially when it's unfounded and untrue. Yet another Elitist Spouting Lies #Hate 
— P. Golightly (@MrsP_Golightly) January 28, 2017 She was also labeled a feminist as if that were a bad thing.
